Registres del PHY llegits amb XEmacLite_PhyRead(&emaclite_inst, 0x1F, i, &data)

0x00 		BMCR		0011000100000000
0x01 		BMSR		0111100001101001
0x02 		PHYIDR1		0010000000000000
0x03 		PHYIDR2		0101110010010000
0x04 		ANAR		0000000111100001
0x05 		ANLPAR		0100000111100001 BASE PAGE
0x05 		ANLPANRP	0000000000000111 NEXT PAGE
0x06 		ANER		0010100000000001
0x07 		ANNPTR		0000000000000000
0x08 		RESERVED	0000000000000000
0x09 		RESERVED	0000000000000000
0x0A 		RESERVED	0000000000000000
0x0B 		RESERVED	0000000000000000
0x0C 		RESERVED	0000000000000000
0x0D 		RESERVED	0000000000000000
0x0E 		RESERVED	0000000000000000
0x0F 		RESERVED	0000000000010101
0x10 		PHYSTS		0000000000000000
0x11 		RESERVED	0010110000000000
0x12 		RESERVED	0000000000000000
0x13 		RESERVED	0000000000000000
0x14 		FCSCR		0000000000000000
0x15 		RECR		0000000100000000
0x16 		PCSR		0000000000000001
0x17 		RBR			0000000000000000
0x18 		LEDCR		1000000000111111
0x19 		PHYCR		0000100000000100
0x1A 		10BT_SCR	0000000000000000
0x1B 		CDCTRL1		0000000000000000
0x1C 		RESERVED	0110000000010001
0x1D 		EDCR		0000100000111110
0x1E 		RESERVED	0000000000000000
